item.description:
Please Update your RSVPs if your plans have changed and you have not purchased your tickets from Boston Uncorked.  

Here is another great wine tasting event from Boston Uncorked. The event will take place from 7:00 - 9:00 PM on Thursday, November 8. Their last event at this venue sold out last February. It will sell out this time too so purchase your tickets from Boston Uncorked if you want to go.

Members from my Red Sox Natives will also be joining us.

Join Boston Uncorked for their Fall Kick Off Celebration featuring an exclusive portfolio tasting of 90+ Cellars Wines at Aragosta Bar & Bistro in Boston's historic North End. Boston Uncorked will provide the wine, food and stunning harbor views...all we have to do is sit back and enjoy their Wines On The Wharf!

Tickets are $39.00 per person. There are no Maybe RSVPs since you must purchase a ticket in advance. To purchase your ticket go to www.bostonuncorked.com [url=http://www.bostonuncorked.com][/url]. Please do not call or contact any other source for tickets.

The Aragosta Bistro is located at 3 Battery Wharf with Google/Map address at 377 Commercial Street, Boston, 02109.

We had a great time at last February's event.

See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby ay 6:45 PM or Inside after 7:00 PM
item.name: Wines On The Wharf with Boston Uncorked at Aragosta Bistro
